how do you add to host name to get rid of annoying message?
Nice very good didn't even need the installer, the key worked with version 3.2.0 thank you very much.

To add the exception in your Hosts file, please locate your Hosts file in your system folders:

â€¢ Windows Users:  %SystemRoot%\system32\drivers\etc
â€¢Mac Users: /private/etc/hosts
â€¢Unix Users: /etc/inet/hosts

Use a simple text-editing tool to open and edit the contents of your Host file (Notepad/Wordpad).

Find the already developed list and add towards the bottom:

127.0.0.1         www.binaryfortress.com

Voila!

Since people always seem to be a little mentally handicapped when it comes to installing software from this site, here's a quick guide.
1. Add the hosts file exception line:
#    127.0.0.1 www.binaryfortress.com
underneath everything else in there.
2. Install with the included installer (or legacy off the site)
3. Right click the icon in the tray>Pro: enter serial
4. Paste in the Serial code from the included file.
5. Right click tray icon>Settings>options: uncheck automatic updates.
6. Add a block in your firewall as an added precaution
7. Enjoy

for those who can[t seem to find where to put the key you right click and go to "enter license key" and put it in there.
